verses.verse: What <S%G5101><s%> shall we say <S%G2046><s%> then? <S%G3767><s%> Shall we continue <S%G1961><s%> in sin, <S%G266><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> may abound? <S%G4121><s%>

God forbid. <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3361><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> shall we, that <S%G3748><s%> are dead <S%G599><s%> to sin, <S%G266><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> any longer <S%G2089><s%> therein? <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2228><s%> Know ye not, <S%G50><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> so many of us as <S%G3745><s%> were baptized <S%G907><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> were baptized <S%G907><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G848><s%> death? <S%G2288><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> we are buried <S%G4916><s%> with him <S%G846><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> baptism <S%G908><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> death: <S%G2288><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> like as <S%G5618><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> was raised up <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> should walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> newness <S%G2538><s%> of life. <S%G2222><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> we have been <S%G1096><s%> planted together <S%G4854><s%> in the <S%G3588><s%> likeness <S%G3667><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> we shall be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in the likeness of his resurrection: <S%G386><s%>

Knowing <S%G1097><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> old <S%G3820><s%> man <S%G444><s%> is crucified with <S%G4957><s%> him, that <S%G2443><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> might be destroyed, <S%G2673><s%> that henceforth <S%G3371><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> should not serve <S%G1398><s%> sin. <S%G266><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> he that is dead <S%G599><s%> is freed <S%G1344><s%> from <S%G575><s%> sin. <S%G266><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> we be dead <S%G599><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> we believe <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we shall also <S%G2532><s%> live with <S%G4800><s%> him: <S%G846><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> being raised <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> dieth <S%G599><s%> no more; <S%G3765><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> hath no more dominion over <S%G2961><s%> <S%G3765><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> in that <S%G3739><s%> he died, <S%G599><s%> he died <S%G599><s%> unto sin <S%G266><s%> once: <S%G2178><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> in that <S%G3739><s%> he liveth, <S%G2198><s%> he liveth <S%G2198><s%> unto God. <S%G2316><s%>

Likewise <S%G3779><s%> reckon <S%G3049><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> unto sin, <S%G266><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> alive <S%G2198><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Let not <S%G3361><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> reign <S%G936><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> mortal <S%G2349><s%> body, <S%G4983><s%> that ye should obey <S%G5219><s%> it <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> lusts <S%G1939><s%> thereof. <S%G848><s%>

Neither <S%G3366><s%> yield <S%G3936><s%> ye your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> as instruments <S%G3696><s%> of unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> unto sin: <S%G266><s%> but <S%G235><s%> yield <S%G3936><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> unto God, <S%G2316><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> those that are alive <S%G2198><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> as instruments <S%G3696><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%> unto God. <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> shall not <S%G3756><s%> have dominion over <S%G2961><s%> you: <S%G5216><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> ye are <S%G2075><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> but <S%G235><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> grace. <S%G5485><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> then? <S%G3767><s%> shall we sin, <S%G264><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> but <S%G235><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> grace? <S%G5485><s%> God forbid. <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3361><s%>

Know <S%G1492><s%> ye not, <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> ye yield <S%G3936><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> obey, <S%G5218><s%> his servants <S%G1401><s%> ye are <S%G2075><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> ye obey; <S%G5219><s%> whether <S%G2273><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of obedience <S%G5218><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> righteousness? <S%G1343><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> God be thanked, <S%G2316><s%> <S%G5485><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye were <S%G2258><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> of sin, <S%G266><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> ye have obeyed <S%G5219><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> that form <S%G5179><s%> of doctrine <S%G1322><s%> <S%G1519><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was delivered <S%G3860><s%> you.
Being then <S%G1161><s%> made free <S%G1659><s%> from <S%G575><s%> sin, <S%G266><s%> ye became the servants <S%G1402><s%> of righteousness. <S%G1343><s%>

I speak <S%G3004><s%> after the manner of men <S%G442><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> infirmity <S%G769><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> flesh: <S%G4561><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> ye have yielded <S%G3936><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> servants <S%G1400><s%> to uncleanness <S%G167><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to iniquity <S%G458><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> iniquity; <S%G458><s%> even so <S%G3779><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> yield <S%G3936><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> servants <S%G1400><s%> to righteousness <S%G1343><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> holiness. <S%G38><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> ye were <S%G2258><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> of sin, <S%G266><s%> ye were <S%G2258><s%> free <S%G1658><s%> from righteousness. <S%G1343><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> <S%G3767><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> ye then <S%G5119><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> those things whereof <S%G3739><s%> ye are now ashamed? <S%G1870><s%> <S%G3568><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> of those things <S%G1565><s%> is death. <S%G2288><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> being made free <S%G1659><s%> from <S%G575><s%> sin, <S%G266><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> become servants <S%G1402><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> holiness, <S%G38><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wages <S%G3800><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> is death; <S%G2288><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> gift <S%G5486><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
